mapper.sql:
FROM fdrecipesave a LEFT JOIN fdFoodUploaded b on b.pseq = a.fdrsSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND ifmmDelNy = 1 AND ifmmDelNy = 0
ORDER BY a.fdrsSeq DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT a.fdrsSeq , a.fdrsName , a.fdrsIntroduction , a.fdrsServingsCd , a.fdrsTimeCd , a.fdrsDifficultyCd , a.fdrsTip , a.fdrsDelNy , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime , b.path , b.uuidName
LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
SELECT fdmtMaterial , fdmtAmount , fdmtDelNy , fdrsSeq FROM fdmaterial WHERE 1=1 and fdrsSeq = #{fdrsSeq}

SELECT a.fdrsSeq , a.fdrsName , a.fdrsIntroduction , a.fdrsServingsCd , a.fdrsTimeCd , a.fdrsDifficultyCd , a.fdrsTip , b.originalName , b.uuidName FROM fdrecipesave a LEFT JOIN fdFoodUploaded b on b.pseq = a.fdrsSeq WHERE 1=1 and a.fdrsSeq = #{fdrsSeq}
SELECT seq , type , defaultNy , sort , originalName , uuidName , ext , size , delNy , pseq , path FROM fdFoodUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND pseq = #{fdrsSeq} ORDER BY sort
SELECT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmId , a.ifmmPassword , a.ifmmName FROM fdmember a WHERE 1=1 and a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and a.ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
mapper.update: update fdmember SET ifmmDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fdmember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
